metadata.title: CVE-2019-12958 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, a heap-based buffer over-read could be triggered in FoFiType1C::convertToType0 in fofi/FoFiType1C.cc when it is trying to access the second privateDicts array element, because the privateDicts array has only one element allocated.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> looks like CVE-2017-14976 in poppler ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore.

criterions.comment: poppler package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.57.0-2ubuntu4').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
